rows.label: qev095802_MSG0001
rows.name: ...Animal fur? Um, could I ask you to describe it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0002
rows.name: ...I seeee. And it's also covered in blood stains?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, this is mostly a guess, but I think the fur might
belong to a cunning Sylooth, which is native to the
Delusian Mountains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0004
rows.name:
A cunning Sylooth has been spotted in the southern
parts of the Delusian Mountains. It's a pretty gentle
creature by nature, buuuuut...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0006
rows.name: Yeah. Maybe you want to check it out just in case?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0007
rows.name:
If it HAS become aggressive, I need you to take...
appropriate measures. Er, you know? Measures?
For the safety of future Pathfinders in the area?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0008
rows.name:
For now, let's see about ascertaining a connection to
the destroyed data probe, if any. Sound good? Good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Wait, WHAT?! Shut the front door!
Two Sylooth are fighting each other?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hmm... It's most likely a territory dispute,
judging from the circumstances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0012
rows.name:
Hey, wait a sec! Maybe the data probe suffered
collateral damage as a result of their scuffles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0013
rows.name:
I mean, that would explain why only a single probe
was destroyed for no apparent reason, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0014
rows.name:
Well, if we don't want it to happen again,
I guess we'll need to take...appropriate measures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0015
rows.name:
Normally I'd suggest we must find the one who's
encroaching on the other's territory and deal with it
that way, but there's not really a way to know that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0016
rows.name:
So I guess you'll just have to hunt both of them.
...Sucks, I know. Sorry about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0017
rows.name:
I feel bad about mucking with the ecosystem like
this, but we don't really have a choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095802_MSG0018
rows.name:
And I know you may have your own reservations,
but I still trust you to handle it.[ST:wait ]
